T02D2131:177b-1: shr'i kharsa p'a ni ma tri s'a dha n'i /
T02D2131:177b-3: dpal kharsa p'a ni yab yum gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2131:177b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2131:177b-5: gang zhig spyan ras gzigs dbang yum //
T02D2131:177b-6: thugs rje'i dbyangs las sku bzhengs pa //
T02D2131:177b-7: ye shes lha mo dmar mo sgeg /
T02D2131:178a-2: dal sgrub po dam tshig can //
T02D2131:178a-3: gsang sngags rgyal mo la mos pas //
T02D2131:178a-4: dur khrod dmar ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D2131:178a-5: cho ga rnam gsum bsgom par bya //
T02D2131:178a-6: re zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02D2131:178a-7: sems bskyed khyad par can bskyed nas /
T02D2131:178a-8: dam tshig rnam lnga'i mchod pa dang ldan pas //
T02D2131:178a-9: me tog dmar po'i mandal bshams te /
T02D2131:178a-10: bsam gtan bskyod pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02D2131:178a-11: thog mar sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2131:178a-12: aom a'a bighn'a na ta kri ta h'um phat /
T02D2131:178a-13: 'bum phrag gsum gyis bgegs bskrad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2131:178a-14: de na bdag med chen mo yi //
T02D2131:178a-15: ngang las skyes gyur lha mo'am //
T02D2131:178a-16: yang na lte dbus sprul pa'i nang //
T02D2131:178a-18: bam las mngon gyur dmar mo dpa' //
T02D2131:178a-19: bcu drug na tshod shin tu sgeg / cung zad khro ba'i zhal bzhad dam //
T02D2131:178a-20: gri gug thod 'dzin kha tv'am bsnams //
T02D2131:178a-21: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal brgyan //
T02D2131:178a-22: g-yon bskum g-yas brkyang dbang phyug dang //
T02D2131:178a-23: au ma'i nu ma mnyam brdzis mdzad //
T02D2131:178a-25: mi rus rdo rje'i phreng bas spras //
T02D2131:178a-26: dril bu g-yer ka'i sgra sgrogs la'o //
T02D2131:178a-27: skra grol gcer bu bde ba'i nyams //
T02D2131:178a-28: rdor phreng rdo rje zur phud ldan //
T02D2131:178a-29: g-yung drung 'khyil pas smin mtshams brgyan //
T02D2131:178a-30: sngags gsum gyis bkang bha ga'o //
T02D2131:178a-31: de snying padmo dmar dbus su //
T02D2131:178a-32: ye shes rdo rje phyag rgyas 'dzin //
T02D2131:178a-33: bam zhes bya ba rnam shes khyim //
T02D2131:178a-34: rnam rtog bsdus dang mi rtog grol //
T02D2131:178a-35: go rims ji bzhin ji gnas dang //
T02D2131:178a-36: lhag mthong rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02D2131:178a-37: de tshe dmigs pa rang dga' dang ;
T02D2131:178a-39: 'od zer bzhu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2131:178a-40: snang ba thim dang sems can thim //
T02D2131:178a-41: lus thim srog thim nam mkha' yi //
T02D2131:178a-42: rnal 'byor nyi zla zung du 'jug / dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2131:178a-43: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shr'i mi tra'i gdams pa rdzogs so /
